scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && npm run bump:auditfix
scripts.bump:dev: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '.localPeerDependencies // {} as $L | .devDependencies // {} | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | has($K) | not)) | map(.key + "@latest") | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.bump:prod: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '.localPeerDependencies // {} as $L | .dependencies // {} | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | has($K) | not)) | map(.key + "@latest") | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.postswitch: npm run postswitch:dev && npm run postswitch:prod
scripts.postswitch:dev: PACKAGES_TO_INSTALL=$(cat package.json | jq --arg SWITCH_NAME $SWITCH_NAME -r '((.["switch:" + $SWITCH_NAME] // {}).devDependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(.key + "@" + .value) | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_INSTALL" ] && npm install --save-dev $PACKAGES_TO_INSTALL || true
scripts.postswitch:prod: PACKAGES_TO_INSTALL=$(cat package.json | jq --arg SWITCH_NAME $SWITCH_NAME -r '((.["switch:" + $SWITCH_NAME] // {}).dependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(.key + "@" + .value) | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_INSTALL" ] && npm install --save $PACKAGES_TO_INSTALL || true
scripts.preswitch: PACKAGES_TO_UNINSTALL=$(cat package.json | jq --arg SWITCH_NAME $SWITCH_NAME -r '((.["switch:" + $SWITCH_NAME] // {}).devDependencies // {}) + ((.["switch:" + $SWITCH_NAME] // {}).dependencies // {}) | keys | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_UNINSTALL" ] && npm uninstall $PACKAGES_TO_UNINSTALL || true
